project_descr: Wind Energy Application in Eritrea is designed to reduce Eritrea's energy related CO2 emissions by promoting both on grid and off-grid wind energy systems as a substitute for fossil fuel based energy generation.

outputs.output_descr: The project demonstrates viability of applications of Wind Energy in Eritrea at two levels; through generation of 750KW output from a wind farm feeding into a grid, and generation of power at village level from decentralized stand alone wind turbines. Besides the project will work to increase awareness raising of decision makers and develop national capacity to plan operationalize and manage the wind energy technology in Eritrea.

project_title: wind energy application pilot project in eritrea
